keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

lead_paragraph: The insurgent group, based in Pakistan’s northwestern frontier, flows fighters into Afghanistan and has orchestrated a long campaign of guerrilla and terrorist attacks against the Afghan government and its American sponsors. It has also harbored Al Qaeda and other terrorist groups.

headline.main: Americans Move Against Haqqani Network in Afghanistan
